document_data.name: Erelgus Mistmrone
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Erelgus Mistmrone''' was an eccentric painter of [[Yhaunn]], considered to be the most prestigious painter of [[Sembia]] by some in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Erelgus's fame came from his oversized paintings, which were beloved across Sembia. His works were notoriously oversizedâ€”each painting was about the size of a barn's doors. Erelgus's paintings usually depicted scenic Sembian seacoasts with waves crashing over purple-hued rocks. The paintings often showed picturesque castles and pergolas as well as figures of people wearing gowns.
